name: Ewan D. Tempero
content: Ewan Tempero's Home Page School of Computer Science at The University of Auckland Ewan Tempero, BSc(Hons) Otago , MS PhD Wash Office: Building 303 (Science Centre) Room 53338 Princes StreetAuckland Phone: +64 9 373 7599 x83765 (automatic, voice mail) +64 9 373 7999 (operator) Facsimile: +64 9 373 7453 Email: e.tempero@auckland.ac.nz Position: Professor School: School contact details Official Profile Research My main area of research is measuring software design quality. To support this kind of research I manage the Qualitas Corpus, a standard corpus of open-source Java software for use in empirical studies of software. Examples of my research can be found in my Google Scholar Profile. Teaching I teach software engineering in the School of Computer Science and the Department of Electrical, Computer, and Software Engineering. Service Roles Deputy Head, School of Computer Science Employment History September 1990 — December 1996 Lecturer in Computer Science at Victoria University of Wellington, Wellington, New Zealand January 1997 — January 2002 Senior Lecturer in Computer Science at Victoria University of Wellington, Wellington, New Zealand February 2002 — January 2025 Associate Professor in Computer Science at University of Auckland, Auckland, New Zealand Software Engineering I have views on software engineering, including how it is different from computer science.
